version_description:
Book your service online at your local participating Ford dealer
Access, manage and settle your Ford Credit accounts
Receive incentives and rewards through FordPass Perks
… And bug fixes and general improvements based on your feedback

Live Traffic updates for on-time arrivals with SYNC 3 and Applink™.
… And bug fixes and general enhancements based on your feedback.

What’s New - In this release we’ve focused on improving the experience for Live Traffic users. We’ve also squashed a few bugs so hopefully you’ll find the app a little more reliable.
What’s Coming Up - We’re looking at launching an improved Online Service Booking in March. So stay tuned.
We’re Listening! - If you encounter any problems, or have suggestions to improve FordPass then you can call one of our Guides (01277 123 456) or drop us an email (FPEU@ford.com). We’d love to hear from you!

We’re always looking at better ways to do things. And we’d love to hear your feedback. So get in touch with our Ford Guides on 01277 254 745. Or email FPEU@ford.com.

In the latest version of FordPass you can experience:

• An enhanced Online Service Booking feature
• Live Traffic, now available for more vehicles
• Enhancements to parking
• Less bugs to make the app more reliable
• And in April, you’ll be able to view your maintenance schedule and see detailed information about your warranty.

We’re always looking at better ways to do things. And we’d love to hear your feedback. So get in touch with our Ford Guides on 01277 254 745. Or email FPEU@ford.com.

In the latest version of FordPass you'll find:

• Access to the latest information about your vehicle’s warranty
• Less bugs to make the app more reliable
• And coming soon, an exciting new partnership that will help you move in even more ways!

We’re always looking at better ways to do things. And we’d love to hear your feedback. So get in touch with our Ford Guides on 01277 254 745. Or email FPEU@ford.com.

In the latest version of FordPass you'll find:

• An enhanced Live Traffic service
• Access to the latest information about your vehicle’s warranty
• Less bugs to make the app more reliable
• And next month, we'll be announcing a new Parking partner

We’re always looking at better ways to do things. And we’d love to hear your feedback. So get in touch with our Ford Guides on 01277 254 745. Or email FPEU@ford.com.

In the latest version of FordPass you'll find:

• Help identifying over 500 car parks from our latest partner, NCP
• An improved Live Traffic service
• Less bugs to make the app more reliable
• And in the coming months we'll be introducing a new partner to help you move in even more ways.

We’re always looking at better ways to do things. And we’d love to hear your feedback. So get in touch with our Ford Guides on 01277 254 745. Or email FPEU@ford.com.

In the latest version of FordPass you'll find:

• An improved Live Traffic service
• Enhancements to your Parking experience
• Less bugs to make the app more reliable
• And next month we'll be introducing a new partner that will enhance your FordPass experience even further

We’re always looking at better ways to do things. And we’d love to hear your feedback. So get in touch with our Ford Guides on 01277 254 745. Or email FPEU@ford.com.

• An improved Live Traffic service
• Enhancements to your Parking experience
• Less bugs to make the app more reliable
• And soon we'll be introducing a new partner that will enhance your FordPass experience even further

We’re always looking at better ways to do things. And we’d love to hear your feedback. So get in touch with our Ford Guides through the app via chat, call or email.

• Convenient access to Hertz vans near you
• Less bugs to make the app more reliable
• And soon you'll be able locate your nearset and cheapest petrol stations with FordPass

In the latest version of FordPass you'll find:

• Fewer bugs to make the app more reliable
• The option to locate a coffee shop, restaurant or even an ATM around your current location or around a location that you plan to visit
• The ability to search for a destination on your phone and send it to your car’s Sat Nav with SYNC 3 and AppLink™ automatically⁵

In the latest version of FordPass you'll find:

> A refreshed user interface that makes navigating the app easier.
> A new Find section that allows you to locate nearby destinations easily.
> A new Move section that acts as a hub for all your vehicles’ important information.

With the latest FordPass release, you can:
• Book your next service through the app (UK only)
• View your vehicle's warranty information
• Receive notification, if your vehicle alarm is triggered (TCU vehicles only)
• Swipe to send a destination to your vehicle

We've also improved existing features:
• An enhanced Ford Transit search experience, so you can find your nearest Transit Centre and relevant parking
• And a few bug fixes to ensure the app is more reliable

We’re always looking at ways to improve the FordPass app. Why: to make it better and faster, as well as more reliable and useful for you.

With the latest release, you’ll find a few bug fixes and upgrades that make the app even more reliable.

Enjoy your travels with FordPass.
Making things better is always a good thing. That’s why this HotFix will sort out a few little bugs.

We’re always looking at ways to improve the FordPass app. Why: to make it better and faster, as well as more reliable and useful for you.
 
With the latest release, there’s also a range of new features. For example, now you can:
 
• Flag your favourite fuel stations, car parks or points of interest
• Access your vehicle maintenance schedule
 
We’ve fixed a few bugs too, and made other improvements that make the app even more reliable. 
 
Enjoy your travels with FordPass.

Our latest update brings you a range of brand new features:
• Get achievements and insights for the distances you and your Ford travel, with helpful links along the way. You can also keep track of your fuel usage by connecting your phone to your vehicle whenever you drive.
• View your Owner’s Manual in a fresh, streamlined experience.

version_name: 2.7 brings one new main feature to FordPass: - Monthly Fuel Report: get insights into your fuel use

version_description:
Version 2.7 brings one new main feature to FordPass:

- Monthly Fuel Report: get insights into your fuel use, see the MPG for your journeys, understand how much fuel is costing you, and how you can be more efficient.

We’re constantly working on minor bug fixes too, so the app is always getting better for you.
Thanks to everyone who's offered us feedback. We're working to improve your experience on the app, and hope to get the Fuel Report feature back up and running soon.

What have we been working on?
• Just like we do with any update, we’ve been fixing some annoying little bugs, to make sure we keep improving FordPass for all of you.

FordPass for Apple Watch is here! With all the best features optimised for the watch, it’s now even easier to stay connected with your vehicle.

Just like we do with any update, we’ve been fixing some annoying little bugs, to make sure we keep improving FordPass for all of you.
Our team have been working hard to fix any pesky bugs and keep your FordPass experience running smoothly.

We’ve been working away to fix bugs and address any issues we find in the app. These tweaks help to make your FordPass experience that little bit better with every update.

Be sure to keep an eye out for some exciting new features.
We've brought you a little update this month, to get rid of some bugs that have popped up.

We’ve been working behind the scenes to de-bug and clean up the app, so things can run properly.



Please keep flagging any issues you come across, so we can continue to improve the app for you.
A routine update this month. We’ve been getting rid of more bugs and fixing the issues you’ve been reporting; continuing our mission to make the app better for everyone.
Just like your Ford, apps need a service too. This release will look to fix a few pesky bugs to ensure FordPass runs smoothly for you.
Just like your Ford, apps need a service too. This release will look to fix a few pesky bugs to ensure FordPass runs smoothly for you.

"We’re introducing the Journeys feature and would love your feedback. You can record your journeys and keep a history of all your trips.

You can also see driver insights: information based on your braking, acceleration and cornering, to help improve your driving efficiency.

Check out all the Journeys features and let us know what you think."
Little bugs are fixed by our tech team with each update. Please continue to let us know if you spot any.
We’ve seen your bug reports and are constantly working to eliminate them with each update.
We’ve seen your bug reports and are constantly working to eliminate them with each update.
Making things better is always a good thing. This release will fix a few little bugs that have popped up.
We’ve been working behind the scenes to clean up the app, so things can run properly.
We’ve been working away to fix bugs and address any issues we find in the app. These tweaks help to make your FordPass experience that little bit better with every update.
If you don’t like bugs, good news. We’re sorting a few out in our latest release.

Pour cette dernière version, nous nous sommes concentrés sur l'aspect et la prise en main de FordPass. Nous espérons que vous apprécierez les mises à jour et, comme toujours, nous vous invitons à nous faire part de vos commentaires sur les améliorations que nous pourrions apporter.
Il est toujours bon d'améliorer les choses. Cette version corrigera quelques petits bugs qui sont apparus.
Il est toujours bon d'améliorer les choses. Cette version corrigera quelques petits bugs qui sont apparus.
Il est toujours bon d'améliorer les choses. Cette version corrigera quelques petits bugs qui sont apparus.
Il est toujours bon d'améliorer les choses. Cette version corrigera quelques petits bugs qui sont apparus.
Il est toujours bon d'améliorer les choses. Cette version corrigera quelques petits bugs qui sont apparus.
Il est toujours bon d'améliorer les choses. Cette version corrigera quelques petits bugs qui sont apparus.
Il est toujours bon d'améliorer les choses. Cette version corrigera quelques petits bugs qui sont apparus.

Nous nous employons à corriger les bugs et à résoudre tous les problèmes détectés dans l'application. Ces modifications vont permettre d'améliorer petit à petit votre expérience FordPass, chaque fois qu'une mise à jour sera appliquée.

Le Mode Surveillance* vous aide à protéger votre véhicule et tout ce qu'il contient. Renforcez la sécurité de votre véhicule en cas de besoin et vous recevrez des alertes chaque fois qu'une portière ou le capot sera ouvert. Ou même lorsque le véhicule sera déverrouillé.
*sera progressivement introduit sur les différents modèles de véhicules Ford équipés d'un modem FordPass Connect.

Dans cette version de FordPass, vous trouverez les mises à jour suivantes :
- Un résumé mensuel des trajets du véhicule et des informations de conduite enregistrées dans FordPass.
- Un lien vers Ford Insure.
- Ainsi que des corrections de bugs pour résoudre tous les problèmes que nous avons trouvés dans l'application.
Il est toujours bon d'améliorer les choses. Cette version corrigera quelques petits bugs qui sont apparus.

Dans cette version de FordPass, vous trouverez les mises à jour suivantes :- Le Journal d'itinéraires EV a été renommé Mes données de conduite EV et déplacé dans la partie Mes itinéraires- Améliorations de la fonction Mode surveillance

Nous nous employons à corriger les bugs et à résoudre tous les problèmes détectés dans l'application. Ces modifications vont permettre d'améliorer petit à petit votre expérience FordPass, chaque fois qu'une mise à jour sera appliquée.
Il est toujours bon d'améliorer les choses. Cette version corrigera quelques petits bugs qui sont apparus.
Il est toujours bon d'améliorer les choses. Cette version corrigera quelques petits bugs qui sont apparus.

Dans cette version de FordPass, vous trouverez les mises à jour suivantes :
- Ajoutez un calendrier dans le Mode surveillance pour recevoir des alertes à des heures spécifiées de la journée ou de la semaine
- Filtrez vos trajets pour cinq véhicules
- Marquez les trajets de vos véhicules selon différentes catégories
